nodes.text: 5H-0T was a male Vendor droid selling his wares in the Training Room of the Jedi Temple, using Coruscant Mission Tokens as a currency.

5H-0T first appeared in "Star Wars: Clone Wars Adventures (video game)" as a gear vendor in the Jedi Temple training room, using Coruscant Mission Tokens as a currency. The name 5H-0T resembles the word "shot".
